title: Naya Rivera’s Family Sues for Wrongful Death After Her “Accidental Drowning”
description:
Naya Rivera received critical acclaim for portraying the bad ass lesbian cheerleader “Santana Lopez” on the popular TV show “Glee”. With a promising career ahead of her, the world was shocked to learn of her untimely death at just 32 years old. What was supposed to be a fun boating trip on a lake with her 4-year old son Josey sadly ended in her accidental drowning. On behalf of their son and Naya’s estate, Naya’s ex-husband, Ryan Dorsey, sued multiple defendants, including Ventura County, for her wrongful death. Tune in as we break down the claims.

Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/legallyjudgy
LinkTree: https://linktr.ee/legallyjudgy
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/legallyjudgy/?hl=en
